00019 #ifndef _COPPERPLATE_REFERENCE_H
00020 #define _COPPERPLATE_REFERENCE_H
00021 
00022 #include <sys/types.h>
00023 #include <stddef.h>
00024 #include <stdint.h>
00025 #include <xeno_config.h>
00026 
00027 #define libcopperplate_tag  0   /* Library tag - unique and constant. */
00028 #define libcopperplate_cbi  1   /* Callback binary interface level. */
00029 
00030 #define container_of(ptr, type, member)                                 \
00031         ({                                                              \
00032                 const typeof(((type *)0)->member) *__mptr = (ptr);      \
00033                 (type *)((char *)__mptr - offsetof(type, member));      \
00034         })
00035 
00036 typedef uintptr_t memoff_t;
00037 
00038 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_PSHARED
00039 /*
00040  * Layout of a function reference handle in shared memory (32-bit
00041  * value):
00042  *
00043  * xxHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHLLLLLPPPPP
00044  *
00045  * where: 'P' => function index in the per-library array
00046  *        'L' => library tag
00047  *        'H' => symbol hash value (symname + cbi)
00048  *        'x' => unassigned
00049  *
00050  * NOTE: handle value -1 is kept for representing a NULL function
00051  * pointer; bit #31 should remain unassigned and cleared for this
00052  * purpose.
00053  */
00054 
00055 struct __fnref {
00056         void (*fn)(void);
00057         unsigned int hash;
00058 };
00059 
00060 #define __refvar(l, s)          __ ## l ## __ref__ ## s
00061 #define __refmangle(l, h, p)    (((h & 0xfffff) << 10)|((l & 0x1f) << 5)|(p & 0x1f))
00062 #define __refhash(r)            (((r) >> 10) & 0xfffffU)
00063 #define __reftag(r)             (((r) >> 5) & 0x1f)
00064 #define __refpos(r)             ((r) & 0x1f)
00065 #define __refchk(v, r)                                                  \
00066         ({                                                              \
00067                 int __tag = __reftag(r), __pos = __refpos(r);           \
00068                 typeof(v) __p = (typeof(v))__fnrefs[__tag][__pos].fn;   \
00069                 assert(__fnrefs[__tag][__pos].hash == __refhash(r));    \
00070                 assert(__p != NULL);                                    \
00071                 __p;                                                    \
00072         })
00073 #define dref_type(t)            memoff_t
00074 #define fnref_type(t)           int
00075 #define fnref_null              -1
00076 static inline int __fnref_nofn(void *fnaddr)
00077 {
00078         return fnaddr == NULL;
00079 }
00080 #define fnref_put(l, s)         (__fnref_nofn((void *)(s)) ? fnref_null : __refvar(l, s))
00081 #define fnref_get(v, r)         ((v) = (r) < 0 ? NULL : __refchk(v, r))
00082 #define fnref_register(l, s)                                            \
00083         int __refvar(l, s);                                             \
00084         static void __attribute__ ((constructor)) __ifnref_ ## s(void)  \
00085         {                                                               \
00086                 __refvar(l, s) = __fnref_register(#l, l ## _tag,        \
00087                                                   l ## _cbi,            \
00088                                                   #s, (void (*)(void))s); \
00089         }
00090 #define fnref_declare(l, s)     extern int __refvar(l, s)
00091 
00092 extern void *__pshared_heap;
00093 
00094 int pshared_check(void *heap, void *addr);
00095 
00096 #define MAX_FNLIBS  16          /* max=32 */
00097 #define MAX_FNREFS  16          /* max=32 */
00098 
00099 extern struct __fnref __fnrefs[MAX_FNLIBS][MAX_FNREFS];
00100 
00101 int __fnref_register(const char *libname,
00102                      int libtag, int cbirev,
00103                      const char *symname, void (*fn)(void));
00104 
00105 #define __memoff(base, addr)    ((caddr_t)(addr) - (caddr_t)(base))
00106 #define __memptr(base, off)     ((caddr_t)(base) + (off))
00107 #define __memchk(base, addr)    pshared_check(base, addr)
00108 
00109 #define mutex_scope_attribute   PTHREAD_PROCESS_SHARED
00110 #define sem_scope_attribute     SEM_PSHARED
00111 #define thread_scope_attribute  PTHREAD_SCOPE_SYSTEM
00112 #define monitor_scope_attribute COBALT_MONITOR_SHARED
00113 
00114 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_PSHARED */
00115 
00116 #define dref_type(t)            typeof(t)
00117 #define fnref_type(t)           typeof(t)
00118 #define fnref_null              NULL
00119 #define fnref_put(l, s)         (s)
00120 #define fnref_get(v, r)         ((v) = (r))
00121 #define fnref_register(l, s)
00122 #define fnref_declare(l, s)
00123 
00124 #define __pshared_heap  NULL
00125 
00126 #define __memoff(base, addr)    (addr)
00127 #define __memptr(base, off)     (off)
00128 #define __memchk(base, addr)    1
00129 
00130 #define mutex_scope_attribute   PTHREAD_PROCESS_PRIVATE
00131 #define sem_scope_attribute     0
00132 #define thread_scope_attribute  PTHREAD_SCOPE_PROCESS
00133 #define monitor_scope_attribute 0
00134 
00135 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_PSHARED */
00136 
00137 #endif /* _COPPERPLATE_REFERENCE_H */
